Type.Name: TabAlign

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TabAlign extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: This enumeration specifies where a tab stop appears relative to the text

remarks.para: Right now, there is only one value in this enumeration. In the future, Right, Center and Numeric may be supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.TabAlign Left = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tab stop appears to the left of the text
